\textbf{\small Born in Chichester in Sussex, father ran boating business,
mother home duties. Two brothers James and John and sister Marie.
Trained as marine radio officer, spent 3 years at sea before settling
in Australia in 1969. Married Jennifer a nursing sister in 1969. Three
children Kathryn b1970, Michael b1972 and Carolyn 1977. Retired in
1997 due to work related stress. Interests computing and Internet,
guns, boating and hunting}\tabularnewline
